parameters: \bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>(I don't really need to go in, do I...)
\nc<Security Guard 2>That girl caught the attention of the board members...
\nc<Security Guard 1>Yeah, that's why it's hard to lay a hand on her.

\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>(Wow, when did the rumors spread? Maybe this is more
effective than I thought?)
\bustMsgExp[1, 3]\nc<Saki>(Alright... Today I'll just do the chores and go home!)
\bustMsgExp[1, 1]\nc<Saki>Whoa! W-What's going on all of a sudden?
\nc<Security Guard 2>Where is it this time? Oh, it's just over there.
\nc<Saki>Why are you acting so nonchalant?! Isn't this an emergency?

\nc<Security Guard 1>Nah... It's usually just a false alarm from the security
system.
\nc<Security Guard 2>That thing tends to malfunction quite often.

\nc<Security Guard 1>Besides, it's broad daylight. There's no way a thief would
come now, right?
\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>(I see. Now that you mention it...)

\nc<Security Guard 1>But since the alarm has sounded, we have to respond... Hmm.
This time, let's have Saki-chan go!
\bustMsgExp[1, 1]\nc<Saki>What?! Why do I have to go?!

\nc<Security Guard 2>That's great. Saki-chan seems to have some free time... You
came to help us out anyway, right?
\nc<Security Guard 1>Just check the alarm system... Please? Okay?

\bustMsgExp[1, 2]\nc<Saki>(That's your job in the first place... It must be really
bothersome for you.)
\nc<Security Guard 1>Once you've checked it out, you can go home...

\nc<Saki>I can go home early...?\bustMsgExp[1, 4]Hmm, I guess I have
no choice. You're sure I just need to check it and that's
it?
\nc<Security Guard 1>That's right. It's probably just a false alarm anyway.

\nc<Security Guard 2>I'll give you a walkie-talkie, so if anything happens,
contact us with this.
\bustMsgExp[1, 0]\nc<Saki>Don't you have something more befitting of a security guard?

\nc<Security Guard 1>Ah, we're the type to handle things physically... But we do
have handcuffs, you know?
